title.rendered: Chicago Restaurant Owners Lobby City to Raise Indoor Dining Capacity Before Weather Cools

content.rendered: “I don’t see in my lifetime, any period of time, that could be considered more challenging than right now,” said Doug Roth, a restaurant consultant at Playground Hospitality.
